Invest in curated, high-quality private credit funds.
[Join Waitlist](https://useconstant.com/<https:/useconstant.typeform.com/to/LlDO4xbk>)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63bcc592a79225e98912edde/665f00b554e39de5ca51ba63_hero%20image.svg)
## We draw from experience at:
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63bcc592a79225e98912edde/63ec97e4f3741a7ec3b2af10_Group%203412.svg)](https://useconstant.com/<http:/en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Silver_Point_Capital>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63bcc592a79225e98912edde/63ec97e3cdb7e731509f5d90_Group%203411.svg)](https://useconstant.com/<http:/www.jpmorgan.com>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63bcc592a79225e98912edde/63ec97e3fd6a22adf66ed5d8_Group%203410.svg)](https://useconstant.com/<http:/www.blackstone.com>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63bcc592a79225e98912edde/63ec97e3d91d2c230ba81a33_Group%203409.svg)](https://useconstant.com/<http:/www.troweprice.com>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63bcc592a79225e98912edde/63ec97e4e7fe503b8892111c_Group%203408.svg)](https://useconstant.com/<http:/www.princeton.edu>)
## Why Private Credit?
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63bcc592a79225e98912edde/63bcc592a792251fca12ee88_Vector%20\(4\).svg)
### Strong Returns
Over the last 20 years, private credit returned ~10% annually.1
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63bcc592a79225e98912edde/63f540735898010163f09507_Vector%20\(13\).svg)
### Robust Risk Profile
Despite higher returns, private credit has historically shown lower risk than public credit.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63bcc592a79225e98912edde/63f54026d0603a829ebe6c18_Group%20\(6\).svg)
### Diversification
Potential for a low correlation to other asset classes can provide smart diversification.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63bcc592a79225e98912edde/63f54172e0bdd4158c97c263_Group%203447.svg)
### Regular Income
Historically, much of the return from private credit has come in the form of regular distributions.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63bcc592a79225e98912edde/63f5417f780fdfa93ddc2df2_Vector%20\(15\).svg)
### Return Premium
Investors can be compensated with higher returns in exchange for potential lower liquidity.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63bcc592a79225e98912edde/63bcc592a79225393712ee86_Vector%20\(3\).svg)
### Room for Talent
Private credit markets can be inefficient, creating opportunities for high-quality funds.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63bcc592a79225e98912edde/66353307d74b031aa357bbcd_Group%201000003785.svg)
## A powerful gateway.
Constant makes it easy to invest in high-quality private credit funds, across a range of strategies.
## Your bridge to private credit.
We curate private credit funds onto our platform, and provide access with low minimums.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63bcc592a79225e98912edde/668dc86dbf07a2a1dce6bdeb_Group%203697.svg)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/63bcc592a79225e98912edde/66393b5c21365eb6b2b09ff6_AUM%20Over%20Time.svg)
## A nascent, rapidly growing asset class.
The private credit industry grew 400%+ since 2010.2 Yet, it has been dominated by institutions and ultra-wealthy investors: we're on a mission to change that.
## A Better Way to Yield.
We are credit specialists, excited to provide new opportunities for your portfolio. Constant is an exclusive investment platform, available on an invite-only basis. Join our waitlist, and we will get in touch as soon as possible.

### Company Overview: Constant

**Name:** Constant  
**Founded:** 2023  
**Location:** New York (exact address not specified)  
**Team Size:** 2 employees  
**Batch:** Y Combinator W23  
**Group Partner:** Dalton Caldwell  

**Mission:** Constant aims to democratize access to high-quality private credit investment opportunities, making these traditionally exclusive asset classes available to a broader audience.

---

### What Does Constant Do?

Constant operates as a private credit investment platform that simplifies the process of investing in curated, high-quality private credit funds. Here's how they bridge the gap for investors:

1. **Curated Fund Access:** Users can discover and invest in a selection of private credit funds tailored for varying investment needs.
2. **Guided Investment Process:** The platform guides users through the intricate steps of making these investments, ensuring a smoother experience for even the inexperienced investor.
3. **Low Investment Minimums:** One of Constant’s standout features is its low minimum investment requirements, making it feasible for more people to enter the private credit space.

### Why Private Credit?

Private credit is an emerging asset class that has shown strong returns over the past two decades, averaging approximately 10% annually. Here are a few compelling reasons to consider private credit:

- **Robust Risk Profile:** Historically, private credit presents a lower risk than public credit options.
- **Diversification Potential:** Private credit often has a low correlation with other asset classes, which can enhance a portfolio’s overall stability.
- **Regular Income:** Investors often receive regular distributions, making this an attractive option for those seeking consistent income.
- **Return Premium:** Higher returns typically accompany longer investment horizons and potential liquidity trade-offs, appealing to those who are willing to navigate the less liquid market.

### Growth and Future Directions

Since its inception, the private credit industry has grown over 400% since 2010. Traditionally, this market has been dominated by institutional and ultra-wealthy investors. Constant's mission is to shift that paradigm, allowing more investors to partake in this burgeoning space.

### Call to Action

For those interested in exploring private credit as part of their investment strategy, Constant invites potential users to join their waitlist. The platform is currently available on an invite-only basis, emphasizing its exclusive nature.

### Closing Thoughts

Constant positions itself as a powerful gateway to the private credit world, leveraging technology to make it more accessible for a wide range of investors. With industry expertise and a straightforward approach, it’s poised to help redefine how private credit can fit into broader investment portfolios.

For more information, check out their website: [Constant](https://useconstant.com) and be sure to join the waitlist to stay updated!

---

This overview encapsulates Constant’s mission and offerings, drawing a picture of an innovative company ready to democratize private credit investing.
